alert.note: Alert for North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sioux, southeastern Niobrara and northeastern Goshen Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Lusk, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison, Prairie Center and Van Tassell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
